org.apache.xml.security.c14n

类 CanonicalizerSpi

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.xml.security.c14n.CanonicalizerSpi
  • 直接已知子类:
    CanonicalizerBase

    public abstract class CanonicalizerSpi
extends Object
    Base class which all Canonicalization algorithms extend.
